28th July,2025 to 31st March,2026

Avail Now
Eligible Cards

Offer not applicable on Corporate Cards , SBI Rupay Credit Card transaction done via UPI.

Summary
15% Discount on best available room rates on making the reservation through www.welcomheritagehotels.in
10% discount on Food & Soft Beverages.
Promocode SBI15 is applicable during the booking.
The offer is applicable on select participating properties of Welcome Heritage Hotels. (Refer the list of participating Hotels )
Steps to avail this offer

Visit www.welcomheritagehotels.in >> Fill in details in Hotel search bar with Promo Code “SBI15” >> Fill in the personal details and apply Promo Code “SBI15” >> Proceed with Payment using your SBI Credit Card.
